duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead an IT Project Manager for a team that supports the agile development of a custom application for DS.
Manage project documentation, process tailoring, meeting minutes, project schedules, and risk register updates.
Lead facilitator for Government and customer client for development recommendations and project path forward.
Create and maintain a 3-year roadmap describing the planned evolution of the platform.
Lead team product implementation or capability changes effectively.
Facilitate the development, standardization, and implementation of Agile software development processes.
Participate in Agile sprint ceremonies and serve as the primary liaison with Product Owners.
Lead the Scrum team in using Agile methodology and Scrum practices to manage scope and timelines.
Support the Scrum Master and assist with coordinating backlog, sprints, metrics, retrospective meetings, and daily stand-ups.
Facilitate recommendations regarding software development releases and requirements for customer consideration and approval.
Review deliverables for quality and coordinate with external offices for IT Change Control.
Ensure all project management CTO processes are followed.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in IT, Computer Science, or a related field (Master's preferred)
